name: Fox-Run
description:
This is a practice 2D Infinite Runner Game inspired by a mobile game "Cookie Run"

The player has to jump or crouch to dodge obstables or land on to platform while collecting the cherries for points.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

연습용으로 쿠키런을 모작한 2D 무한 러너 게임입니다.

플레이어는 장애물을 점프나 엎드리기로 피하며  체리를 줍는게 목적입니다.
